title: Doppler effect formula
extract: v = Velocity of sound or light in medium, f = Real frequency, f' = Apparent frequency. Doppler effect formula is used to find the apparent frequency and wavelength for the source moving towards the observer and away from the observer or observer moving towards the source or away from the source.
extract_html: v = Velocity of sound or light in medium, f = Real frequency, f' = Apparent frequency. Doppler effect formula is used to find the apparent frequency and wavelength for the source moving towards the observer and away from the observer or observer moving towards the source or away from the source.
